name: MyMICDS
0:
”Alexa, ask MyMICDS what's for lunch tomorrow.”
”Alexa, ask MyMICDS what lunch is on Monday.”
”Alexa, ask MyMICDS what day it is tomorrow.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my m. i. c. d. s.
des: This is an Alexa skill for MyMICDS.net. Right now, it can tell you what's for lunch or what day of the six-day cycle it is. Note that a MyMICDS.net account is not required!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
